suculenta.name: Succulent
suculenta.tip: Well-draining soil, little water. Tolerates neglect.

helecho.name: Fern
helecho.tip: Constant moisture, indirect light. They like shade.

cactus.name: Cactus
cactus.tip: Very little water, lots of direct sun. Hardy.

floral.name: Flowering plant
floral.tip: Frequent watering, partial sun. Remove wilted blooms.

aromatica.name: Herb
aromatica.tip: Direct sun, regular watering. Prune to encourage growth.

trepa.name: Climber
trepa.tip: Bright indirect light, moist soil. Guide the growth.

frutal.name: Fruit tree
frutal.tip: Lots of sun, deep watering. Fertilize in spring.

otra.name: Other
otra.tip: Adjust values according to your plant's needs.

onboarding.subtitle: Your personal plant care assistant
onboarding.canChangeName: You can change it if you prefer another name
onboarding.weWillUseIt: We'll use it to personalize your experience
onboarding.selectPlants: Select the plants you have or want to add
onboarding.gardenConfigured: Your garden is configured and ready to go
onboarding.canAddLater: You can add plants later from the app
onboarding.configureLocation: Set up your location to receive weather alerts
onboarding.enableNotifications: Enable notifications so you never miss watering
onboarding.languageSubtitle: You can change it later in Settings

settings.title: Settings
settings.locationDescription: Your location is used to show weather and relevant alerts for your plants.
settings.notificationsDescription: Receive reminders to care for your plants and weather alerts.
settings.notificationsBlocked: Notifications are blocked. To enable them, go to Settings > My Garden > Notifications on your device.
settings.permissionDeniedMessage: We need access to your location to show local weather.
settings.locationError: Could not detect your location. Try searching for your city manually.
settings.permissionsNeededMessage: To receive notifications, you need to allow access in your device settings.
settings.plantIdDescription: Set up your PlantNet API key to identify plants with photos. Get one free at my.plantnet.org
settings.upgradeSubtitle: Unlimited plants, alerts, tips and more

today.emptyGardenText: Add your first plant to start receiving care reminders.

plants.title: My Plants
plants.noPlants: You don't have any plants yet
plants.tipText: Use the + button to add new plants. Each card shows today's tasks.
plants.emptyText: Tap the + button to add your first plant and start caring for your garden.

explore.title: Explore plants
explore.subtitle: Database with {{count}} common plants
explore.noResultsText: We couldn't find plants with that name. Try a different search term.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.instructions: Tap a day to view tasks, add notes or reminders.

login.tagline: Care for your plants with love
login.syncNotConfigured: Cloud sync is not configured. You can use the app without an account.
login.disclaimer: Your data will be saved only on this device. Sign in to sync between devices.
login.errorGoogle: Could not sign in with Google
login.errorApple: Could not sign in with Apple

plantCard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

weatherWidget.forWeatherAlerts: To see weather and personalized alerts

weatherAlerts.title: ALERTS FOR YOUR PLANTS
weatherAlerts.currentRainMessage: No need to water today. Nature takes care of it.
weatherAlerts.expectedRainMessage: {{amount}}mm of rain expected. You can skip watering.

gardenHealth.title: Garden health
gardenHealth.excellent: Your garden is in optimal condition
gardenHealth.good: Your garden is fine, with some details

photoAlbum.title: PHOTOS
photoAlbum.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?
photoAlbum.emptyText: Add photos to track your plant's progress
photoAlbum.premiumText: Track your plant's growth with photos

plantDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

health.optimalCondition: This plant is in optimal condition
health.keepItUp: No problems detected. Keep up the good care!
health.waterEvery: Water every {{days}} days to keep it healthy
health.needsSunHours: Needs {{hours}} hours of sun per day
health.overdueWaterSuggestion: Water the plant as soon as possible. Make sure to soak all the soil.
health.overdueSunSuggestion: Place the plant in a spot with natural light during the recommended hours.
health.noCareSuggestion: Record when you water or care for the plant to keep track.
health.extremeWeatherSuggestion: Pay attention to weather conditions and protect your plants.

Your garden deserves
the best
paywall.subtitle: Unlock all the tools to care for your plants like an expert
paywall.socialProof: Thousands of gardeners already use Premium
paywall.unlimitedPlantsDesc: No 5-plant limit, add as many as you want
paywall.forecast7DaysDesc: Plan your plant care for the whole week
paywall.finePrintAnnual: Cancel anytime during the free trial. No charge until the 7 days are over.
paywall.finePrintLifetime: One-time payment. Lifetime premium access with no renewals.
paywall.purchaseError: Could not complete the purchase. Please try again.
paywall.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.

alerts.currentTemp: It's currently {{temp}}°C. Your {{name}} can't tolerate below {{min}}°C.
alerts.coldMessage: Your {{name}} can't tolerate below {{min}}°C, tomorrow will be {{forecast}}°C.
alerts.heatMessage: Your {{name}} suffers above {{max}}°C, tomorrow will be {{forecast}}°C.
alerts.neverCared: This plant has never been cared for
alerts.heatWave: Heat wave - water early or at sunset
alerts.strongWindOutdoor: Strong wind - don't put plants outside
alerts.rainNoWater: Rain forecast - you may not need to water

wateringRec.rainingNow: It's raining, no need to water
wateringRec.willRainToday: Rain expected today, you can skip watering
wateringRec.rainTomorrow: Rain expected tomorrow, you can wait
wateringRec.extremeHeat: It's very hot, water early (before 9am) or at sunset
wateringRec.heat: It's hot, consider watering a bit more than usual
wateringRec.humidity: High humidity, you can wait a day
wateringRec.wind: Wind dries quickly, don't forget to water
